Wanda Ewing (1970-2013) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe a mụrụ na Omaha, Nebraska. O lere nka ya ányá dị ka "ihe na-akpali akpali na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị"
Ozi a na-ahụkarị n'ọrụ nka ya bụ nwanyị ojii dị mpako, ọ ga-esiri ike ileghara ya anya. Ewing gụrụ akwụkwọ óbíbí akwụkwọ na San Francisco Art Institute ebe ọ natara BFA ya na 1997

Ọ natara MA na MFA ya na obibi akwụkwọ na Mahadum Iowa na 2001 na 2002, n'otu n'otu. Ọ bụ prọfesọ na Mahadum Nebraska na Omaha, ebe ọ kụziri klas nka anya site na 2004 ruo 2013. Ewing gosipụtara na mba niile ma nweta ọtụtụ onyinye màkà ọrụ ya.
Ewing bụ ónyé na-akọwa onwe ya dị ka "latch hook maven". O jiri collage, printmaking, latch hook, na mgbasa ozi ndị ọzọ mepụta ihe ya
Ọrụ ya na-enyocha okwu gbasara agbụrụ, okike, mmekọahụ, ịma mma, na njirimara. Ihe osise ya na-eji ejiji na-akpali agụụ mmekọahụ na anya dị ike iji gbaghaa echiche ndị inyom ojii na mgbasa ozi
Ụmụ nwanyị Ewing rụrụ ọrụ dị mkpa na nka ya

Ihe osise ya na-eji ụdị ụmụ nwanyị na ọdịnaya ya "mebie ihe oyiyi ụmụ nwanyị". Mgbasa ozi na-egosipụtakarị ụmụ nwanyị ojii n'ụzọ na-adịghị mma site n'ịme ka ha nwee mmekọahụ ma mee ka ahụ ha bụrụ ihe ziri ezi
Ọ bụ ebumnuche Ewing iji gbanwee ihe ngosi ndị ahụ ka ha bụrụ ndị dị mma
Ihe osise ya na-egosi ụmụ nwanyị ojii dị ka "ndị nwere obi ike" na ndị nwéré obi ike.
A gụnyere ọrụ Ewing n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta gụnyere Richard M

Ross Museum na Delaware, Tama Art University Museum na Tokyo, Japan, na San Francisco Art Institute na ndị ọzọ. A tụlere ma nyochaa ọrụ ya n'akwụkwọ dị iche iche, ọkachasị Maria Buszek's Pin-up Grrrls: Feminism, Sexuality and Popular Culture. E gosipụtara nhọrọ nke ihe osise ya na International Print Center na New York n'etiti afọ 2000. A na-aga n'ihu na-egosi ma na-anakọta ọrụ ya.
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2013, a chọpụtara na Ewing nwere ọrịa kansa akpa ume nke anọ. Wanda Ewing nwụrụ na Disemba 8, 2013 mgbe ọ dị afọ 43 site na nsogbu na ọgwụgwọ ọgwụ.
Ewing bụ onye nnọchi anya obodo Omaha. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ iji mepụta oghere maka ndị na-ese ihe na-acha anụnụ anụnụ na ihe nkiri nka nke Omaha
Ọnụnọ nke ndị na-ese ihe na Omaha toro n'okpuru nlekọta ya

Union for Contemporary Arts na Omaha, Nebraska kpọrọ gallery na ncheta ya. Ewing bụ prọfesọ mbụ na-arụ ọrụ oge niile nke agba iji nweta ọrụ na ngalaba nka nke nnukwu mahadum steeti. Mahadum nke Nebraska Foundation guzobere agụmakwụkwọ nka n'aha ya.

Ọrụ Wanda Ewing na-aga n'ihu na-akpali ụmụ nwanyị na-ese ihe "ịchọta olu ha". Les Femmes Folles: Women in Art, otu nzukọ sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke ihe ngosi ọ haziri n'okpuru otu aha ahụ, na-aga n'ihu na-akwado ụmụ nwanyị na nka iji sọpụrụ ya.
